verses.roman:
ācārya-gosāñire prabhu kare guru-bhakti
tāhāte ācārya baḍa haya duḥkha-mati

synonyms: ācārya-gosāñire—unto Advaita Ācārya; prabhu—the Lord; kare—does; guru-bhakti—offering respects like a spiritual master; tāhāte—in that way; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; baḍa—very; haya—becomes; duḥkha-mati—aggrieved.
translation: Lord Caitanya respected Advaita Ācārya as His spiritual master, but Advaita Ācārya Prabhu was greatly aggrieved by such behavior.
